hero-relic.broken.name: Broken Hero's Relic
hero-relic.repaired.name: Repaired Hero's Relic
hero-relic.legendary.name: Legendary Hero's Relic
AdventureBar-Hide.name: Toggle Adventure Bar
AdventureBar-Hide.description: Hide or show the Adventure Bar on your screen
AdventureBarConfigMenu.name: Adventure Bar Config Menu
AdventureBarConfigMenu.description: Open the Adventure Bar Config Menu
harp.name: Harp
arrow.lightbringer.duskspire: The Lightbringer arrow couldn't affect this monster.
ability.lltk-toggle.name: LLTK Form Swap
ability.lltk-toggle.description: Swaps the LLTK between sword and gun form.
config.lltk-difficulty.name: LLTK Difficulty
config.lltk-difficulty.description:
Changes the requirements for acquiring the Long Live The King weapon.
Easy: Lighting up all 4 candles in Grandpa's evaluation.
Medium: Easy + Acquiring the Infinity Blade.
Hard: Medium + 50% Perfection.
Default: Medium
config.early-paladin-unlock.name: Early Paladin Unlock
config.early-paladin-unlock.description: Whether the Paladin Skill is unlocked by default (true) or during the Finale Intermission (false).
config.monster-health-buff.name: Monster Health Buff
config.monster-health-buff.description: Buff monster health by a percentage (but not in the mines below level 20). This is to account for dual-wielding being available.
config.section.lltk.text: This is how you toggle the Long Live the King between sword form and gun form. There is also an ability in the Adventure Bar once you have it unlocked.
config.lltk-toggle-right-click.name: LLTK Swap on Right click
config.lltk-toggle-right-click.descripti: Swap forms of the LLTK on right click while holding it.
config.lltk-toggle-keybind.name: LLTK Toggle Keybind
config.lltk-toggle-keybind.description: A keybind for swapping the LLTK form if held.
section.Aether-Bar.Name: Aether Bar
section.Aether-Bar.Description: Settings relating to the Aether Bar.
int.Red.Name: Aether Bar Red
int.Red.Descripion: The red value for the Aether Bar's color
int.Blue.Name: Aether Bar Blue
int.Blue.Descripion: The blue value for the Aether Bar's color
int.Green.Name: Aether Bar Green
int.Green.Descripion: The green value for the Aether Bar's color
int.TextRed.Name: Aether Text Red
int.TextRed.Descripion: The red value for the Aether Bar's text color
int.TextBlue.Name: Aether Text Blue
int.TextBlue.Descripion: The blue value for the Aether Bar's text color
int.TextGreen.Name: Aether Text Green
int.TextGreen.Descripion: The green value for the Aether Bar's text color
section.Keybinds.Name: Keybinds
section.Keybinds.Description: Settings for several keybinds throughout the mod.
keybind.configure-bar.name: Configure Adventure Bar
keybind.toggle-bar.name: Toggle Adventure Bar
empty-slot.title: Empty Ability Slot
empty-slot.description: This ability slot is empty. Configure it with the adventure bar configure menu.
ability.shadowstep.name: Shadowstep
ability.shadowstep.description: Hide in the shadows, making your next strike a critical.^Aether cost: 15
ability.remoteguide.name: Remote Handbook
ability.remoteguide.description:
Opens the S&S player handbook.

Aether cost: 0
ability.shapeshift.description:
Shapeshift into an animal, providing various benefits.

Aether cost: 5 + 1 per three seconds
Mateo.RejectBouquet: Did Aideen help you put that bouquet together, @? It looks beautiful.
rogue-skill.name: Artificer
rogue-skill.unlock.1: Adds an armor slot and a bow tool.
rogue-skill.unlock.2:
Purified ore now has a chance of dropping from their
respective nodes, to be used at the Underforge.
rogue-skill.unlock.4:
Exquisite gems now have a chance of dropping from their
respective nodes, to be used at the Underforge.
rogue-skill.unlock.6: You can now perform Blade Coating at the Underforge.
rogue-skill.profession.armor-recovery.de: Once an hour, get a chance to recover Armor Points by changing locations.
rogue-skill.profession.rogueish-archetyp: 25% chance of shooting a second arrow without consuming additional ammo.
rogue-skill.profession.flash-of-genius.d: The first craftable you make each day has zero ingredient cost. (Ingredients must still be owned)
rogue-skill.profession.armor-proficiency: Adds 50% more armor points on top of your total amount.
rogue-skill.profession.shadowstep.name: Shadowstep
rogue-skill.profession.shadowstep.descri: Ability: Shadowstep^Become hidden, reducing most monster aggro until you attack.^Your first attack is a critical.
rogue-skill.profession.hunters-mark.name: Hunter's Mark
rogue-skill.profession.hunters-mark.desc: Once a creature is attacked, consecutive hits on the same creature do more damage each time.
anvil.not-enough: You need {{qty}} of that for this effect.
description.coating.(O)769: Basic attacks affect all four cardinal directions. (Invisible)
description.coating.(O)768: Upon killing a mob, they blow up. (No damage to farmer.)
description.coating.(O)767: You can attack across stones and other objects.
keybind.shapeshift.name: Shapeshift Keybind
keybind.shapeshift.description: The key to shapeshift (if unlocked). Long press (2 seconds) to change your form.
item.druidic-essence.name: Druidic Essence
item.druidic-essence.description: Nature's power, manifest. Used to breathe life into new things.'
hector.engagement.wait: You've just started dating! Wait a while.
wallet-item.name: Thorned Circlet Fragment
druidics.name: Druidics
druidics.profession.shapeshifting.name: Skilled Shapeshifter
druidics.profession.shapeshifting.descri: Adds stamina regeneration ability to shapeshifting.
druidics.profession.agriculture.name: Ancient Agronomist
druidics.profession.agriculture.descript: Reduces cost of creating ancient druidic seeds by one essence.
druidics.profession.shapeshifting-stag.d: Adds health regeneration to stamina regeneration with double the speed.
druidics.profession.shapeshifting-wolf.d: Adds ability to fight while shapeshifted. Adds passive defense and attack.
All ancient crops grow 10% faster, and all artisan goods derived from them are worth 10% more. Stacks with Artisan and Agriculturist.
druidics.profession.agriculture-yggdrasi: Druidic essences have an additional 10% chance to spawn. Druidic crops water surrounding crops with the same range as a Quality Sprinkler.
bardics.name: Bardics
bardics.song.buff.name: Fantasia Alla Marcia
bardics.song.buff.description:
Grants a random passive buff.

Usable once per day.
Aether cost: 20
bardics.song.battle.name: Battlefield Overture
bardics.song.battle.description:
Grants either an attack or defense buff.

Usable once per day.
Aether cost: 20
bardics.song.restoration.name: Invigorating Encore
bardics.song.restoration.description:
Restores 25% health and energy.

Usable once per day.
Aether cost: 10
bardics.song.protection.name: Enduring Melody
bardics.song.protection.description:
Creates a protective sound barrier that
keeps enemies away for 30 seconds.

Aether cost: 10
bardics.song.npcbuff.name: Rogues' Humorsque
bardics.song.npcbuff.description:
Offers a buff depending on who it's played to.

Usable on one villager per day.
Aether cost: 25
bardics.song.npcbuff.description.no-deta: Offers a buff depending on who it's played to.
bardics.song.attack.name: Scherzo D'Inganno
bardics.song.attack.description:
Lets out a discordant sound that damages all enemies in range.

Aether cost: 20
bardics.song.attack.description.no-detai: Lets out a discordant sound that damages all enemies in range.
bardics.song.time.name: Ballad of Chronomancy
bardics.song.time.description:
Pauses time for two minutes.

Aether cost: 35
bardics.song.horse.name: Track of {{horseName}}
bardics.song.horse.description:
Teleports you to your horse.

Aether cost: 10
bardics.song.crops.name: Druid's Lullaby
bardics.song.crops.description:
Once per day, applies +25% growth rate to crops
in a 7x7 area around you, once per crop.

Aether cost: 30
bardics.song.obelisk.name: A Walk in Adante
bardics.song.obelisk.description:
Allows remote use of any obelisks you've acquired.

Aether cost: 15
bardics.profession.npcbuff.strength.name:
Animated
Performance
bardics.profession.npcbuff.strength.desc: Strength of Bardic buffs are doubled.
bardics.profession.npcbuff.duration.name: Creative Crescendo
bardics.profession.npcbuff.duration.desc: All Bardic buffs last all day.
bardics.profession.attack.strength.name: Words of Terror
bardics.profession.attack.strength.descr: Damage of Scherzo D'Inganno is doubled.
bardics.profession.attack.range.name: Words of Majesty
bardics.profession.attack.range.descript: Range of Scherzo D'Inganno is extended to the entire location.
witchcraft.name: Sorcery
witchcraft.profession.essence-drops.name: Hedge Witch
witchcraft.profession.essence-drops.desc: Double chance for elemental essence drops. Transmuting Essences now costs 2 essences.
witchcraft.profession.spell-damage.name: Magus
witchcraft.profession.spell-damage.descr: +25% spell damage. Damaging Spells aether cost slightly reduced.
witchcraft.profession.philosophers-stone: All Alchemy recipes have their essence requirements halved. Transmuting Essences now costs 1 essence.
witchcraft.profession.no-teleport-cost.d: Teleportation circle use cost reduced to 0.
witchcraft.profession.spell-damage-2.des: Immune to damage briefly after casting, plus +25% damage buff.
witchcraft.profession.aether-buff.name: Umbral Strider
witchcraft.profession.aether-buff.descri: +75 Max Aether, and restore some aether upon taking damage.
ability.witchcraft.spell-unlock-hint: Unlocked through the Witchcraft research system
witchcraft.spell.haste.name: Haste
witchcraft.spell.message.name: Message
witchcraft.spell.message.description: Speak to anyone you've met from afar.
witchcraft.spell.conjure-refreshments.de: Provides a food which only restores stamina.^^Makes a decent gift for anyone.
witchcraft.spell.polymorph.name: Polymorph
witchcraft.spell.polymorph.description:
Turn an enemy into a slime for 10 seconds. Killing it will make it revert back to its normal form.

Aether cost: 5
Cooldown: 10 seconds
witchcraft.spell.stasis.name: Stasis
witchcraft.spell.stasis.description:
Prevents you from moving, acting, or taking damage for three seconds.

Aether cost: 10
Cooldown: 6 seconds
witchcraft.spell.mage-armor.name: Mage Armor
witchcraft.spell.mage-armor.description:
Increases your maximum armor points for the day.

Aether cost: 5
witchcraft.spell.wall-of-force.name: Wall of Force
witchcraft.spell.wall-of-force.descripti: Summon a wall where you cast, lasting an (in-game) hour.
witchcraft.spell.banishment.name: Banishment
witchcraft.spell.banishment.description:
Send an enemy to another realm for 20 seconds.

Aether cost: 8
Cooldown: 10 seconds
witchcraft.spell.lightning-bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
witchcraft.spell.lightning-bolt.descript:
Fire a bolt of lightning at the closest enemy that can chain into other enemies.

Aether cost: 10
Cooldown: 3 seconds
witchcraft.spell.fireball.name: Fireball
witchcraft.spell.fireball.description:
Cast a ticking time-bomb fireball directed towards your cursor.

Aether cost: 10
Cooldown: 3 seconds
witchcraft.spell.magic-missle.name: Magic Missle
witchcraft.spell.magic-missle.descriptio:
Fire three projectiles that home in on the enemy.

Aether cost: 10
Cooldown: 1 second
witchcraft.spell.no-enemy-found: No enemies found in range. Cancelling {{Spell}}
witchcraft.spell.ice-bolt.name: Icebolt
witchcraft.spell.ice-bolt.description:
Launch an icicle to freeze enemies around your cursor in an AOE.

Aether cost: 10
Cooldown: 10 seconds
witchcraft.spell.raise-spirit.name: Raise Spirit
witchcraft.spell.raise-spirit.descriptio: Summon a ghost from a monster spirit to fight for you.
witchcraft.spell.revive-plant.name: Revive Plant
witchcraft.spell.revive-plant.descriptio:
Revive a 5x5 area of crops around you.

Aether cost: 10
witchcraft.spell.mirror-image.name: Mirror Image
witchcraft.spell.mirror-image.descriptio:
Summon three illusory duplicates, which have a chance of taking a hit for you.

Aether cost: 15
Cooldown: 10 seconds
witchcraft.spell.find-familiar.name: Find Familiar
witchcraft.spell.find-familiar.descripti:
Summon a small pet to follow you for the day, increasing your luck.

Aether cost: 10
witchcraft.spell.ghostly-projection.name: Ghostly Projection
witchcraft.spell.ghostly-projection.desc:
Move without colliding for 15 seconds. At the end, teleport back to where you were upon initial cast.

Aether cost: 7
Cooldown: 20 seconds
witchcraft.spell.misty-step.name: Misty Step
witchcraft.spell.misty-step.description: Quickly teleport to your cursor, if it's reachable via walking.
witchcraft.spell.pocket-chest.name: Pocket Chest
witchcraft.spell.pocket-chest.descriptio:
Opens a chest in dimensional pocket, bound to you. Nobody else can access this chest.

Aether cost: 0
witchcraft.spell.pocket-dimension.name: Pocket Dimension
witchcraft.spell.pocket-dimension.descri:
Teleports you to a pocket dimension which you can use as you like. It acts as a greenhouse.

Aether cost: 0
witchcraft.spell.cooldown: {{Spell}} is on a cooldown. Try again in {{Seconds}} second(s)
paladin-skill.name: Paladin
paladin-skill.unlock.2:
Artificer Shield Upgrade (at the Underforge)

Increases projectile damage.
paladin-skill.unlock.4:
Druid Shield Upgrade (at the Underforge)

Shapeshifting no longer costs Aether to maintain.
paladin-skill.unlock.6:
Bardics Shield Upgrade (at the Underforge)

For songs with a limit once per day you can
now use them a second time each day.
paladin-skill.unlock.8:
Sorcerer Shield Upgrade (at the Underforge)

Random chance of causing a magical shockwave
when a thrown shield hits an enemy.
paladin-skill.profession.shield-throw-hi: Throwing your shield now hits a second target at half damage.
Shields additionally give double the armor points when equipped.
paladin-skill.profession.shield-throw-li:
The Sun'll Shine
On Us Again
On being hit by a thrown shield, nearby enemies will be struck by lightning.
paladin-skill.profession.shield-throw-hi:
They Have An Army
We Have A {{farmerName}}
Shield throw will now hit three targets at full damage.
I Can Do
This All Day

Shields additionally give double the armor points when equipped,
for a total of 4 times the base shield armor value.
paladin-skill.profession.shield-retribut: If you have Armor Points when you take damage and have a Shield equipped, automatically deal damage back at your enemies.
finale-minigame.ability.shadowstep.name: Shadowstep
finale-minigame.ability.shadowstep.descr: Step into the shadows, making the user be unable to be targeted directly until their next attack. The next attack will do critical damage.
finale-minigame.ability.shield-throw.des: Throw a shield as an attack, dealing extra damage compared to a normal attack.
finale-minigame.ability.shapeshift.name: Shapeshift
finale-minigame.ability.shapeshift.descr: Change forms, dealing extra damage and having higher defense for three turns.
finale-minigame.ability.fireball.name: Fireball
finale-minigame.ability.fireball.descrip: Shoot an explosive fireball with impressive firepower.
finale-minigame.ability.bomb-throw.name: Bomb Throw
finale-minigame.ability.bomb-throw.descr: Throw a bomb dealing an explosive amount of damage.
teleport-circle.error.missing-essence: 3 essences not found in nearby chest.
fake-npc.deepdark.mateo-mine: I'm worried, but we've made it this far. Nothing can stop us as long as we stick together.$80
fake-npc.deepdark.cirrus-mine: I'm not sure what's going to happen, @, but with you here we'll be fine!$17
fake-npc.deepdark.dandelion-mine: I have big plans for when this is over, @. Just you wait.$18
fake-npc.deepdark.roslin-mine: This place is thick with Void magic. It's all-consuming...$16
